resources.string: Notices regarding the uploading of your own keys
Finished button: Declaration of consent not agreed
Report infection button: Please confirm that you have provided all information truthfully
confirm all-clear button: Please confirm your revocation of your sick note
Report a suspected infection button: Please confirm that you have provided all information truthfully
Revoke infection message button: Please confirm that you have provided all information truthfully
Check your internet connection and try again.
Something went wrong. Please try again later.
An unknown error has occurred. Please try again later.
Image: Falling numbers of Corona cases
By using the Stop Corona app, you are helping to
slow down the spread of the virus
Image: Contacts are identified via Bluetooth
Activate the automatic digital handshake via Bluetooth to save contacts
Image: Notification of a contact\'s illness
If one of your contacts falls ill, you will be notified of the
time of your last risk encounter
If you should contract COVID-19 yourself or suspect it, you can warn your contacts
Thank you for using the app!
You are actively protecting your health and the health of others. \n \nBy installing the app, you agree to the
.\n \nDo you have any questions? Read more in the
In the case of a confirmed infection,
is possible.\nContacts from other EU countries can be warned or warn you anonymously in the event of an infection using the app.
Image: Notifications and warnings from contacts across Europe

I agree that the Austrian Red Cross (ÖRK) may process my personal data (random figures [“random-IDs], my telephone number, and any suspicion and reporting of my COVID-19 condition [= health data]) for the purpose of rapid interruption of the corona infection chain.
I may revoke my consent at any time, whereby revocation does not affect the lawfulness of processing up until the time that consent is revoked. \n\nFurther information can be found in our
Start the digital handshake to save an encounter. Contacts will be notified anonymously should you fall ill.
Please note, in quarantine you should reduce your contacts to a minimum, therefore the handshake is no longer possible.
Check your symptoms for a possible corona infection.
Are you infected with COVID-19 yourself?
Report a medically confirmed infection to protect your contacts. Your contacts will be notified about an anonymous risk contact.
Device does not support Google PlayServices
Google PlayServices are needed to use the feature Nearby. At the moment the digital handshake only works with Google PlayServices. We are working on alternative methods.
When should I use this feature?
... you have personal contact for more than 15 minutes and are unable to maintain a distance of 2 meters at all times.
... you have personal contact for more than 15 minutes and are in a small, closed space such as a car, a room or on the train.

For the digital handshake, it is checked whether other smartphones in the area have also triggered the handshake. This works via ultrasound. Therefore it is possible that your smartphone emits an audible sound. The sound is recorded by other smartphones with the microphone, and vice versa, your smartphone also uses the microphone to pick up sounds from other devices. For this reason, access to the microphone is required.
The suspicion of one or more of your contacts has not been confirmed.
Google Play Services is not available
The service is currently being updated.
The version of Google Play Services is old.
The installed version of Google Play Services is outdated. Please check for updates. You need at least version 20.18.13, which may be in the beta channel.
The Bluetooth adapter in this device is not supported by the COVID-19 contact notification framework.
To ensure the exposure framework won\'t be killed by the system, the application must be on the not battery optimized list.
Error with COVID-19 Exposure Notifications framework
Internal error. An error has occurred in the COVID-19 contact notifications.
An error within Google Play Services has been detected. It was logged. Please try again later.
Bluetooth is switched off. For COVID-19 contact notifications to work properly, you must enable Bluetooth.
Activate the automatic handshake for this function.

The evaluation of the possible encounter with COVID-19 infected persons did not reveal any relevant risk of infection due to the stored duration or distance of the possible encounter. Please continue to observe the applicable hygiene recommendations.
This version is no longer supported. Download the current version to continue using the app.
With one or more of your contacts a
was detected. Therefore, you yourself are at high risk of being infected.
One of your registered encounters is %s infected with the coronavirus.
%d of your registered encounters are %s infected with the coronavirus.
If you have an official quarantine notification, please take into account the quarantine period specified in the official quarantine notification.
Do not use public transport on your way and avoid contact with other people if possible.
Please go to quarantine immediately and until
\n\nAvoid public transport and contact with other people on the way home.
and report that you have had contact with an infected person on
and that you are a contact person via the app (
You will receive an official COVID-19 test after approx. 5 days. If that is negative, you can end the quarantine.
Keep a physical distance from healthy roommates.
Monitor your health and check your body temperature twice a day.
Ask your neighbors or relatives to take care of you. If that is not possible, the Team Austria will be happy to help you on
1 contact with a suspected corona infection
For one or more of your contacts the
has been detected. Therefore, there is an increased risk for you to be infected.
is suspected to have contracted corona.
If you have an official quarantine certificate, take into account the quarantine period specified in it.
Do not use public transport on your way and avoid contact with other people if possible.
Additional authorizations are required for this feature:
Please allow this in the system settings.
Open the manual handshake on both devices.
Your smartphone will now automatically search for other smartphones.
Select the number of your counterpart below and save.
If you have further questions about the manual handshake, you can find more information in the FAQs.
For medical reasons: This app also works remotely. Please keep at least 1 meter distance.
Activate the automatic handshake in the app and enable Bluetooth.
Your device can exchange random IDs with other app users via Bluetooth.
The random IDs are stored in the COVID-19 contact log of your device.

Contacts are sick 
The contact log can be used to notify you if you have had any contact with the coronavirus. A recommendation is calculated in an algorithm, how long you should stay in quarantine as a precautionary measure.
 You are ill 
The random IDs can also be used to notify other users should you report a possible infection.
Please make sure that Bluetooth is activated.
For medical reasons: This app also works at a distance. Please keep a distance of at least 1 meter.

You can send and receive signals from other Corona apps via Bluetooth. Signals over 5 minutes are recorded in the COVID-19 contact log in your device. This happens anonymously by means of randomly generated IDs.
None of your encounters are currently saved automatically. Please activate the automatic handshake.
Please activate the digital handshake to identify risky contacts
%s days have passed since your latest risk contact
Your contacts have been anonymously notified regarding the risk of an infection.

In the next step, we will anonymously inform your direct contacts of the last %s days.\nWith the mobile number, we ensure that the app is not misused and that infection reports contribute to the common good.
When did you receive your positive test result?
Unfortunately the TAN could not be sent. Please check your mobile phone number.
Confirm your data with the TAN
Please enter the TAN we sent to %s.
Has your corona infection been medically proven?
Notify other contacts of your sick leave

It is important that only clearly confirmed infections are reported. Reporting an infection is voluntary.

The next step is to request access to the stored random IDs. We will then anonymously notify all persons with whom you have exchanged a digital handshake in the last two days. This way you protect others and the further spread of the virus is slowed down. Due to the nature of the system, today's contacts can only be notified tomorrow.

Allow your contacts to be notified now using the random IDs from the contact log.

Now notify other contacts from the day the infection was reported.
It is important that only clearly confirmed infections are reported. Reporting an infection is voluntary.

In the next step, all persons with whom you exchanged a digital handshake on the day of your report will be anonymously notified. In this way you protect others and the further spread of the virus is slowed down. 

Now allow your contacts to be notified using the random IDs from the contact log.
Your personal data will not be passed on to third parties.

string.name: certificate_report_status_agreement_description
string.b: Yes, I have been diagnosed with a Covid-19 infection.

resources.string: I hereby confirm to have provided all information truthfully.
Please make sure the entered TAN is correct.
Exposure framework is not working well
Exposure notification framework is not running properly to continue. Please go back to dashboard and see what is needed to fix.
Please make sure you enter your date of birth in the correct format.
IDs from contact log shared with Stop Corona app
Other contacts will now be notified of your sick note.
Thank you for reporting your infection and for contributing significantly to the common good.
We wish you a speedy recovery!
You have reported your medically confirmed corona infection.
Please quarantine yourself immediately until you are healthy again.\n\nAvoid public transport and contact with other people on the way home.
Keep a physical distance from healthy roommates.
Monitor your health and check your body temperature twice a day.
Ask your neighbors or relatives to take care of you. If that is not possible, the Team Österreich will be happy to help you on
Your doctor will decide when you can end the quarantine.
If possible, do not use public transport on the way and avoid contact with other people.
Please go into self-quarantine and monitor your health within the next days
Reduce personal contacts in your private environment to a minimum and keep a contact diary.
Please keep a sufficient distance from other people and wear a face mask, especially indoors.
If you develop a fever, cough or have difficulty breathing, please call the
If you feel that you cannot manage at home, you cannot breathe or you are seriously ill, please contact the following numbers with the indication of a suspected corona infection:
Do you require any advice or care via telephone?
Please contact your attending physician\n\nIn the event of psychological stress, telephone counselling provides support:
You have reported your medically confirmed corona infection..
Notify people with whom you exchanged a digital handshake on the day you reported sick.
If you are healthy and your quarantine notice has expired, you can end the quarantine in the app using the button below.
In case of infection your contacts are automatically notified anonymously.

I agree that the Austrian Red Cross (ÖRK) may process my personal data (unique identification number [ID], my telephone number, and any suspicion and reporting of my COVID-19 condition [= health data]) for the purpose of achieving a rapid interruption of the corona infection chain. In addition, my public key will be shared with my intensive contacts for the purpose of issuing a warning of a potential danger of infection, as well as a subsequent all-clear notification or a confirmation of such infection.
Yes, I consent to the processing of data.
I may revoke my consent at any time, whereby revocation does not affect the lawfulness of processing up until the time that consent is revoked.
Further information can be found in our
Stay healthy and help to protect others.
In the current situation it is important to follow a few basic rules. Care for you, care for me.
Wash your hands regularly: with soap, warm water and for at least 20 seconds.
Keep at least 1-2 meters distance to other people.
Keep in touch via electronic media.
If you feel ill, please stay home.
The symptoms you describe can occur in case of a corona infection.
Please report your suspected infection in the next step to protect others.

Your message helps to prevent the infection from spreading further. Your close contacts may have become infected unnoticed and already spread the virus. It is therefore important that these people are informed and stay away from other people.
Please take your temperature again in 6 hours.
Avoid social contacts. In this way you help to avoid further infections.
Please contact your attending physician by phone if you need medical assistance. Your doctor can also sign you off sick or issue a prescription using your e-card.
Notify other contacts of your suspicion

Report suspected coronavirus now. Reporting a suspicion is voluntary.

The next step is to anonymously notify all persons with whom you have exchanged a digital handshake in the last two days. This way you protect others and the further spread of the virus is slowed down.

Now allow your contacts to be notified using the random IDs from the contact log.

Now notify other contacts from the day of the sickness report of the suspected infection. Reporting a suspicion is voluntary.

In the next step, all persons with whom you exchanged a digital handshake on the day of your report will be notified anonymously. In this way you protect others and the further spread of the virus is slowed down.

Now allow your contacts to be notified using the random IDs from the contact log.
Your personal data will not be passed on to third parties.
I hereby confirm to have provided all information truthfully.
IDs from contact log shared with Stop Corona App
Thank you for reporting your suspected infection and for contributing significantly to the common good.
Other contacts will now be notified of your suspicion.
Please inform your doctor or the hospital by phone so that you\n • can be tested for coronavirus \n • can get Medical treatment
If this is not possible, please call this number: %s
If you feel that you cannot manage at home, you cannot breathe or you are seriously ill, please contact the following numbers with the indication of a suspected corona infection:
We wish you a speedy recovery!
Report your status to protect others

Your anonymous report helps to break the chain of infection. Your contacts may have been infected unnoticed and have already passed the virus on. Warn these people as soon as possible so that you stay away from other people.
How long have you had symptoms or a positive test result?
Do you already have a positive test result?
You haven\'t taken a test yet or are you still waiting for your test result?
Based on your information, you are suspected of having a corona infection.
You have completed the questionnaire and your symptoms are unclear.
Notify people with whom you exchanged a digital handshake on the day you reported sick.
Based on your information, you are suspected of having a corona infection.
Talk to your doctor, if you have not done this yet
Please inform your doctor or the hospital by phone so that you\n• can be tested for coronavirus \n• can get Medical treatment
If you are over 65 and / or suffer from at least one of the following conditions, please call

or your doctor to discuss how to proceed:

• Badly controlled high blood pressure
• Diabetes requiring insulin and poor general condition
• Pronounced obesity
• Circulatory disorders in the heart, heart failure requiring therapy
• Advanced COPD
• kidney disease (requiring dialysis)
• high level immunosuppression

Please tell your doctor or hospital by phone so you can

• Can be treated medically
• Can be tested for the corona virus
If this is not possible, please call this number:
If you feel that you cannot manage at home, you cannot breathe or you are seriously ill, please contact the following numbers with the indication of a suspected corona infection:
Please go into quarantine until clarification.\n\nAvoid public transport and contact with other people on the way home.
or your family doctor and report your suspicions.
Keep a physical distance from healthy roommates.
Monitor your health and check your body temperature twice a day.
Ask neighbors or relatives to take care of you. If this is not possible, the Team Austria will be happy to help you at:
Do you need advice or care via telephone?
In case of psychological stress, telephone counselling provides support:
Report a medically confirmed infection to protect your contacts.
Please take your temperature again in 6 hours.
Avoid social contacts. In this way you help to avoid further infections.
Please contact your attending physician by phone if you need medical attention. Your doctor can also sign you off sick via telephone or issue a perscription using your e-card.
Please go into self-quarantine and keep at least 2m distance to healthy people.
Self-quarantine as a precaution. Keep a safe distance from your healthy environment.
Thank you for putting yourself into quarantine, to stop the spread of the virus.

string.name: local_notification_quarantine_end_message_2
string.b: You may now quit your quarantine.

resources.string: The automatic handshake is carried out.
Please switch on the Bluetooth function and restart the handshake in the app.
Thank you for helping us contain the Corona virus.
Please activate the automatic handshake again
and continue to help contain the corona virus.
Notify people with whom you exchanged a digital handshake on the day you reported sick.
has been detected in one or more of your contacts.
One or more of your contacts have reported a
In %d of your contacts a corona infection was confirmed.
One or more corona infections have been reported in your contacts.
One or more suspected corona infections were reported in your contacts.
One or more corona infections have been reported in your contacts.\n\nOne or more suspected corona infections were reported in your contacts.

You have informed your contacts at the %s that you have experienced symptoms of corona infection

If through
• a laboratory report, or
• a doctor
has confirmed that you are not ill with the coronavirus, please inform your contacts immediately with this all-clear.

In the next step we will request access to the stored random IDs for this purpose. We need this access to inform your previously notified contacts about the all-clear.
I hereby confirm that the information provided is true and correct.
Thank you for sharing your information and contributing to the common good.\n\nYour contacts have been notified anonymously.
Share the app and protect yourself and your environment.
Share the Stopp Corona App with your environment.

Install the STOPP Corona App now!
In this way you protect yourself and your environment.
Google Play Store
https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=at.roteskreuz.stopcorona

Apple Store
https://apps.apple.com/at/app/apple-store/id1503717224

After the next step, we will anonymously inform your previously informed contacts that you are withdrawing the sick note. We will validate the mobile number so that we can prevent misuse of this function.
Was your sick call an accident?

You have informed your contacts at the %s that you are infected with the coronavirus\n\nIf this message was an accident, please inform your contacts immediately. This will work automatically and anonymously if you confirm it here.
I hereby confirm the revocation of my sick note.
Thank you for updating your information and thus contributing significantly to a transparent procedure and the common good.
Your contacts will be anonymously notified that it was not a corona infection.
We wish you all the best for the future!
This app stores random IDs of contacts who also use the app. They will be notified if you report sick or suspicious. The random IDs are automatically deleted after 14 days.
Do you want to delete the random IDs now?

If you delete the random IDs, they will not be able to be notified if you report as sick or suspicious.\nOpen the App Preferences. There you will find a link below to the COVID contact protocol settings. In the COVID-19 contact protocol settings you can delete the random IDs.\n
The notification settings cannot be opened.
In this version we use the

. The notifications will continue to be exchanged anonymously and therefore in some places the information will be presented differently.

Encounters that you saved as a handshake before updating to this version are no longer saved for technical reasons and can unfortunately no longer be notified.
Please upload your ID from yesterday. Sharing this ID is still voluntarely.

The Stopp Corona App can also be used across the EU in the future. This enables an infection warning across borders.
 
The data protection information has been adapted accordingly.
 
If you click on button "I agree" you agree to the new
.\n \nDo you have any questions? Read more in the
